project.name: C-C805A-FFMP-03-ST02-DT02-DF17-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C805A-FFMP-03-ST02-DT02-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Good inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charactersBad inputs:1) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
